rows.label: tlk44400085_02_msg0001
rows.name:
You've come from the outside,
haven't you? Allow me to teach
you about our city.

rows.label: tlk44400085_02_msg0002
rows.name:
You may not know this, but our Crown
Prince goes by the name of Zeke.

rows.label: tlk44400085_02_msg0003
rows.name:
He looks much like his father, King
Serich. Very sharp, striking
features. But unlike his father...

rows.label: tlk44400085_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Eeek! Your Highness! Err, umm...but
unlike his father, he...he has a very...
entertaining mode of expression!

rows.label: tlk44400085_02_msg0006
rows.name:
So people find me funny? Excellent!
That's just what I was going for!

rows.label: tlk44400085_02_msg0007
rows.name:
Whenever he opens his mouth, there is
an incessant flow of verbal...nobility.

rows.label: tlk44400085_02_msg0008
rows.name:
Sorry if I'm not being very specific...
I'm sure you'll understand if you talk
to him.
